hero.title: AI-Powered Image Background Removal
hero.subtitle: Professional results in seconds with advanced AI technology

accuracy.title: Pixel-Perfect Accuracy
accuracy.description: Our AI precisely detects and removes backgrounds with incredible detail

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Process images in seconds, not minutes

batch.title: Batch Processing
batch.description: Remove backgrounds from multiple images simultaneously

what_is.question: What is AI Image Matting?
what_is.answer: AI Image Matting is an advanced technology that uses artificial intelligence to automatically remove backgrounds from images with high precision.

how_accurate.question: How accurate is the AI?
how_accurate.answer: Our AI achieves over 99% accuracy in most cases, thanks to advanced deep learning algorithms trained on millions of images.

supported_formats.question: What image formats are supported?
supported_formats.answer: We support all major image formats including JPG, PNG, WEBP, and TIFF. Maximum file size is 50MB.

refund_policy.question: What's your refund policy?
refund_policy.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. No questions asked.
